item.description:
Good Morning:

The York Harbor Inn has a super brunch menu, sure to please everyone's taste!  Their service is great with a view across the street from York Harbor.  Here is their web page:

http://www.yorkharborinn.com/dining/dininghome.htm

Here is their brunch menu:

http://www.yorkharborinn.com/dining/brunch_2011.pdf

I'll be there at 09:45.  They have a fireplace going in the lobby!   From there, we will go for a walk along York Beach and up to the Nubble Lighthouse.  We'll be at low tide, so plenty of space to walk on the beach.  If anyone wants to go after, the York Land Trust just opened up a new trail called Highland Farms; it's about 2 miles or so - and we can stop there on our way back from the beach.

Let me know if you need the driving directions to York Harbor Inn beyond what is posted on the web site.  The only tricky area is in York Village (bear right where the road splits at the fork).   For driving time from the North Shore, estimate (couple of examples) about 40 - 45 minutes north of Newburport; 1 hour north of Topsfield.

For time, estimate 1 1/2 hours for brunch, 1 1/2 hours for the beach walk, and an hour for the York Land Trust trail at Highland Farms for those who choose to join us there as well. 

Please be sure and check back by Saturday night to make sure that we are still on; subject to at least several of us signing up.   A good opportunity to get together on a late fall day!

Randy
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet by the cozy fireplace at 09:45. Enter from the side door which is on your left as you walk down the parking lot.

group.name: North Shore Not Too Intense Hikers

item.name: Brunch and Hike by the Ocean!
